mapper.select: SELECT scmt_no, scon_no, acc_no, scmt_comment, scmt_date FROM share_comment ORDER BY scmt_no DESC
SELECT scmt_comment,scmt_date,acc_no,scmt_no FROM share_comment WHERE scon_no=#{scon_no} ORDER BY scmt_no DESC

SELECT acc_id,scmt_no,scon_no,scmt_comment,scmt_date,acc_no,r FROM ( SELECT acc_id,scmt_no,scon_no,scmt_comment,scmt_date,acc_no,rownum as r FROM( SELECT a.acc_id,s.scmt_no,s.scon_no,s.scmt_comment,s.scmt_date,a.acc_no FROM share_comment s, account a WHERE s.acc_no=a.acc_no AND scon_no=#{scon_no} ORDER BY s.scmt_no DESC ) ) where r<=500

SELECT acc_id, scmt_no, scon_no, acc_no, scmt_comment, scmt_date, r FROM ( SELECT acc_id, scmt_no, scon_no, acc_no, scmt_comment, scmt_date, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT a.acc_id, s.scmt_no, s.scon_no, s.acc_no, s.scmt_comment, s.scmt_date FROM account a, share_comment s WHERE (a.acc_no = s.acc_no) AND s.scon_no=#{scon_no} ORDER BY s.scmt_no ASC ) ) WHERE r <= 500
SELECT count(*) FROM comment_like WHERE scmt_no = #{scmt_no} AND acc_no=#{acc_no} GROUP BY scmt_no, acc_no
